title: david678345
author: david678345
content: Hi I wanted to increase the size of my positions in copy trading in Bingx and I got this message:Risk Warning: You will not be able to copy trades as the margin per trade you set is greater than the available account balance. Deposit or transfer to ensure sufficient funds in the account.Isnt it possible to open a position of 100 dollars with a 10 dollars balance for example? isnt it possible to use leverage in copytrading in Bingx? anyone familiar with copytrading in Bingx?

Deposit or transfer to ensure sufficient funds in the account.Isnt it possible to open a position of 100 dollars with a 10 dollars balance for example? isnt it possible to use leverage in copytrading in Bingx? anyone familiar with copytrading in Bingx? You need to understand that there is cap on the amount of leverage you can open. While there is low leverage of 3x(i.e. you can borrow up to 3 times the amount of your balance) and there is 10x(i.e be able to borrow up to 10 times of your balance) in margin trading, these options depend on the exchange. The coins that are available for margin trading are always indicated in the list of coins that are available for trading.With your balance of $10 dollars, if the coin you want to trade has a leverage up to 10x, you should be able to borrow up to $100 to trade and if the exchange doesn't have up to that, you can't borrow up to that amount, you have to lower it to the max they offered in the exchange to be able to leverage that coin/token.

comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on August 09, 2023, 08:36:10 PMHi I wanted to increase the size of my positions in copy trading in Bingx and I got this message:Risk Warning: You will not be able to copy trades as the margin per trade you set is greater than the available account balance. Deposit or transfer to ensure sufficient funds in the account.Isnt it possible to open a position of 100 dollars with a 10 dollars balance for example? isnt it possible to use leverage in copytrading in Bingx? anyone familiar with copytrading in Bingx? This means that your margin per trade (which is the amount you're putting in) is too big compared to your account balance ($10). So, they're basically saying, "Hold up! You need to have more money in your account to copy this trade." So as a solution i think is to just deposit or transfer more money into your account. In that way, you'll have enough funds to cover the trade, and you won't get the red flag or risk warnings from the platform.
